titleStmt.title: [A congratulatory] poem on occasion of His Highness the Prince of Orange his marriage.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by T.D. for Henry Brome, at the Gun at the West-end of St. Pauls.,

notesStmt.note: Verse: "Hail high and mighty prince! for thou'rt ..."
Imperfect: stained, affecting title; title information suggested by Wing.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.

place.placeName: the Gun at the West-end of St. Pauls.
